name: kuso (itch)
description:
kuso is the sequel to LOVE, and is a challenging yet fair platformer with a simple aesthetic. You have the ability to run, jump, and leave your own checkpoint. Make your way through acid, long jumps, disappearing platforms, bouncers, giant saws, and much more in this dreadful mechanical world. If you're looking for a game that'll challenge your platforming skills, give you something excellent to listen to, and a game to master, kuso is the game for you.

Features:

  • 25 Unique Levels
  • A new soundtrack composed by James Bennett
  • Full Controller Support for xInput Gamepads
  • Collectibles, Secrets, and all that Good Stuff
